players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Suspicious today, Alice. Keep an eye on Charlie."
Charlie: "Thanks Diana, will be more careful. Alice, any plans tonight?"
You: "Charlie, stay alert. Diana is mafia and knows I'm the detective."
Charlie: "Thanks for the tip, Alice. I'll watch Diana closely."
Diana: "Charlie, be cautious. Alice suspects me; keep an eye on both me and her."
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana; she knows I'm the detective. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
